tools.name: employee_profile
tools.title: Employee Profile
tools.description: Fetch employee personal and job details (name, department, manager, join date).

tools.name: leave_request
tools.title: Submit Leave Request
tools.description: Submit a leave request for an employee with start/end dates and leave type.
examples: Saya mau cuti sakit minggu depan

tools.name: leave_balance
tools.title: Leave Balance
tools.description: Check remaining leave balance (annual, sick, maternity, etc).

tools.name: leave_status
tools.title: Leave Status
tools.description: Check leave records and approval status for an employee within a given date range.
examples: Cuti saya tanggal 5-7 Juli sudah disetujui belum?

tools.name: leave_cancel
tools.title: Cancel Leave Request
tools.description: Cancel a pending or approved leave request.

tools.name: payroll_lookup
tools.title: Payroll Lookup
tools.description: Retrieve payroll details for an employee in a given period (net pay, allowances, deductions).

tools.name: payroll_history
tools.title: Payroll History
tools.description: Retrieve payroll details across multiple months.

tools.name: deduction_reason
tools.title: Deduction Reason
tools.description: Explain deduction in payroll (e.g., unpaid leave, late attendance, loan repayment).
examples: Kenapa gaji saya berkurang bulan ini?
Apa alasan potongan Rp1.000.000 di slip gaji saya?

tools.name: attendance_check
tools.title: Attendance Check
tools.description: Verify attendance records for an employee (present, absent, late).

tools.name: attendance_summary
tools.title: Attendance Summary
tools.description: Summarize attendance for an employee over a given period.
examples: Berapa hari saya absen tahun ini?

tools.name: hr_policy
tools.title: HR Policy Lookup
tools.description: Fetch HR policy text or answer questions about company rules.
